GSD.description:
ext4: avoid cycles in directory h-tree

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit e157c8f87e8fac112d6c955e69a60cdb9bc80a60. For more details please see the references link.
